title: Ticket #4946: DAGMan script deferral enhancements
description:
Things that didn't get implemented in "phase 1" (#4488) of this feature:
  • Retry limit (probably global for the whole DAG, via config knob).
  • Possibly order nodes by _nextRunTime in _waitingQueue, so we don't have to search through the whole queue every time.
  • Make sure this feature works right with jobstate.log.
  • Make sure this feature works right with node status file.
  • Make sure this feature works right with metrics.
remarks:

Maybe add something like a $DEFER_NUM macro, so the script can tell how many times it's been tried.
